person.persName: John C. Latham, Sr. (Christian County, Kentucky, merchant, circuit court clerk, and bank president)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, merchant, circuit court clerk, and bank president. Russellville, Logan County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Latham and Nancy Morehead Latham. Married to Virginia Glass Latham in Christian County, Kentucky, on June 28, 1842. Father of John C. Latham, Jr., Mary Rebecca Latham, and Charles M. Latham. Merchant in Christian County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Clerk of Christian County Circuit Court in Christian County from 1854 to 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860. President of the Bank of Hopkinsville in Christian County in 1865.
